title: xAI's finance chief steps down after a few months on job: Report
description: The finance chief of Elon Musk’s xAI, Mike Liberatore, has left the artificial intelligence startup after just a few months on the job, the Wall Street Journal reported.
content:
The finance chief of Elon Musk's xAI, Mike Liberatore, has left the artificial intelligence startup after just a few months on the job, the Wall Street Journal reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.

title: The president blamed AI and embraced doing so. Is it becoming the new ‘fake news’?
description: Politicians are increasingly blaming artificial intelligence to dodge accountability for embarrassing situations.
content:
And when truth is hard to discern, the untruthful benefit, analysts say. The phenomenon is widely known as “the liar’s dividend.”

title: Trump embraces AI blame game
description: Politicians are increasingly blaming artificial intelligence to dodge accountability for embarrassing situations. AI can't defend itself, making it an easy target.
content:
Artificial intelligence, apparently, is the new “fake news.”
Blaming AI is an increasingly popular strategy for politicians seeking to dodge responsibility for something embarrassing — among others. AI isn’t a person, after all. It can’t leak or file... [5767 chars]

title: Artificial Intelligence: Revolutionizing Every Aspect of Life - Tech Titans Dinner: Trump Hosts AI and Tech Leaders at the White House
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly redefining the way we live, work, and interact. No longer confined to the realm of science fiction, AI is now a driving force behind innovations across all sectors— from healthcare and finance to entertainment and manufacturing. Its impact is far-reaching, transforming industries, reshaping economies, and influencing the way we navigate daily life.

title: Tech Titans Dinner: Trump Hosts AI and Tech Leaders at the White House
description: President Donald Trump will host a dinner at the White House inviting top tech CEOs, such as Apple’s Tim Cook and Meta’s Mark Zuckerberg. Notably absent is Elon Musk due to a public fallout with Trump. The gathering follows a meeting of the new Artificial Intelligence Education task force.
content: The White House is set to host a distinguished dinner on Thursday, bringing together top technology CEOs for an evening with President Donald Trump. The exclusive event, held in the newly renovated Rose Garden, aims to foster discussions with leaders... [585 chars]

title: Trump to host top tech CEOs - except Musk - at White House dinner Thursday
description: The guest list is set to include Microsoft cofounder Bill Gates, Apple CEO Tim Cook, Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg, and a dozen other executives from the biggest artificial intelligence and tech firms, according to the White House.
content:
One notable absence from the guest list is Elon Musk, once a close ally of Trump, whom the president tasked with running the government-slashing Department of Government Efficiency. Musk had a public break with Trump earlier this year.
The guest list... [2133 chars]

title: Trump to Host Meta’s Zuckerberg, Tech CEOs in Redone Rose Garden
description: Tech industry leaders including Meta Platforms Inc.’s Mark Zuckerberg, Apple Inc.’s Tim Cook, and Microsoft Corp.’s Satya Nadella are expected to attend an artificial intelligence event hosted by First Lady Melania Trump on Thursday and then join President Donald Trump for an evening reception in the newly renovated Rose Garden.

content:
